Query.name: Prueba
Query.text: insert into Prueba select entero, AVG(entero) as avgEntero, Nuevo.TeS as TeS from Nuevo.win:time(1 min)

Query.name: NO2_Hazardous
Query.text: insert into PollutantLevel select timestamp, stationId, 6 as levelNumber, 'NO2_Hazardous' as levelName from NO2_Avg (value >= 1250 and value <= 2049)

Query.name: AirQualityLevel
Query.text: insert into AirQualityLevel select timestamp, stationId, max(levelNumber) as level from PollutantLevel.win:time_batch(5 minutes) group by stationId

Query.name: NO2_Avg
Query.text: insert into NO2_Avg select stationTs as timestamp, stationId, avg(no2) as value from AirMeasurement.win:time(1 hour) group by stationId

Query.name: StockAvg2
Query.text: insert into StockAvg2 select a1.symbol as symbol, 2*a1.avgPrice as Avg2 from StockAvg as a1

Query.name: NO2_UnhealthyForSensitiveGroup
Query.text: insert into PollutantLevel select timestamp, stationId, 3 as levelNumber, 'NO2_UnhealthyForSensitiveGroups' as levelName from NO2_Avg (value >= 101 and value < 361)

Query.name: NO2_Moderate
Query.text: insert into PollutantLevel select timestamp, stationId, 2 as levelNumber, 'NO2_Moderate' as levelName from NO2_Avg (value >= 54 and value < 101)

Query.name: NO2_Unhealthy
Query.text: insert into PollutantLevel select timestamp, stationId, 4 as levelNumber, 'NO2_Unhealthy' as levelName from NO2_Avg (value >= 361 and value < 650)

Query.name: Prueba2
Query.text: select sum(avgEntero) as Sum from Prueba.win:time(30 sec)

Query.name: NO2_VeryUnhealthy
Query.text: insert into PollutantLevel select timestamp, stationId, 5 as levelNumber, 'NO2_VeryUnhealthy' as levelName from NO2_Avg (value >= 650 and value < 1250)

Query.name: NO2_Good
Query.text: insert into PollutantLevel select timestamp, stationId, 1 as levelNumber, 'NO2_Good' as levelName from NO2_Avg (value >= 0 and value < 54)

Query.name: StockAvg
Query.text: insert into StockAvg select symbol, AVG(price) as avgPrice, StockTick.TS as TS from StockTick.win:time(1 min) group by symbol
